grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 遜色がある【ソンショクガアル】to be inferior to, to suffer by comparison with (something)
尊大不遜【ソンダイフソン】arrogant and presumptuous, haughty arrogance, intolerable insolence
kun reading compounds: 謙る【へりくだる】to deprecate oneself and praise the listener, to abase oneself
